metadata.title: CVE-2023-51781 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - high
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.6.8. atalk_ioctl innet/appletalk/ddp.c has a use-after-free because of an atalk_recvmsg racecondition.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-51781` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-152-generic - 5.4.0-172.190~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-152-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-172.190~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-152-lowlatency - 5.4.0-172.190~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-152-generic - 5.4.0-172.190~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-152-lowlatency - 5.4.0-172.190~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1104-aws - 5.4.0-1119.129~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1107-gcp - 5.4.0-1123.132~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1051-ibm - 5.4.0-1066.71~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1103-oracle - 5.4.0-1118.127~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-5.4.0-1088-raspi - 5.4.0-1103.115~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
